climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Made for your baby’s sensitive skin
Thick and soft wipe for a gentle clean that is safe for baby, hands, and face
Easy dispensing flip-top lid keeps wipes moist and fresh, travel pack contains 30 wipes
body.description: Smooth, soft, and clean – the way a baby’s bottom should be. Seventh Generation Free & Clear Baby Wipes are made for baby’s sensitive skin and contain 0% fragrance, alcohol, parabens, or phenoxyethanol. Our thick, soft wipes are strong enough for big messes while being gentle on newborn baby’s most precious, delicate skin. These baby wipes are moistened with plant-derived skin conditioners like aloe vera and are safe for baby, hands, and face. The flip-top package design locks in moisture to keep wet wipes fresh and allow for easy, on-the-go dispensing. Our hypoallergenic and fragrance free wipes are dermatologist tested and clinically proven to be gentle on baby’s skin. It’s all good, baby. Caring for a little human is a magical undertaking, and we’ve developed an entire line of baby skin care products, wipes, and diapers to bring peace of mind to your journey. For every life-changing milestone, you deserve baby care you can trust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Natural wipes
reviews.reviewText: Gentle but strong. Clean and non-irritating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, stay moist a long time.
reviews.reviewText: These are great! I have them in y desk drawer. I don't use them often but it is great to have them available. These are great because they stay moist, don't smell, and are soft not scratchy. Good buy for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars and Earth's Best and these are by far our favorites
reviews.reviewText: We've tried Honest, Whole Foods 365, and Earth's Best and these are by far our favorites. Good thickness, no scent, right amount of wetness, and you can pull one out at a time with one hand without trouble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They are what they are...
reviews.reviewText: Good wipes. They do what’s needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Gentle with no fragrance. I use it as facial cleanser and it does a good job without irritating my face. Also use it on my dog to clean her face - she's a Yorkie - and wipe away her natural tears. .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I tend to buy free and clear and always read ingredients so I was very disappointed to find preservatives in these Seventh Generation free and clear wipes!! Would not have bought them if I k new this. Every item that goes on or in your body should definitely show ingredients; very important!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super thick! love it...
reviews.reviewText: Just started using these and I loved loved loved them! They are very thick and am happy that the ingredients are better than ones from regular wipes. great size, perfect for throwing it inside a pocket book. I'm a new fan!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic product, great price!
reviews.reviewText: Superior wipes, safe for babies, children, and adults. A very convenient packaging for the teen athletes to keep in their sports bags. I keep a package in the car for spills or for wiping down the interior of the car while waiting at school pick-up. Seventh generation rocks!
